channel.title: Control mixer with pot meter
channel.description: hello there, Im trying to fix that i can control the mixer control with a pot meter . is this possible? or in any another way?it is very important for my design. the goal is to have a demuxer let me choose between in this case the amount of LFO.(in another case i want it to control level of OSC but it is same principle).If it is not possible with a mixer another object. Or i was thinking to make the Pot-meter send via midi CC and have this specific midi CC assigned to the mixer button i want to control. Any way is good for me but i have no clue how to do this im still a Noob. greetings

item.title: Control mixer with pot meter
item.dc:creator: @kashis dennis
item.description:
@kashis wrote:

THANKS!!! all working now!

edit:

now i can control 4 LFO's speed and Amount with 2 potmeters and 1 switch great stuff!

Read full topic

item.title: Control mixer with pot meter
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Hey!

You could connect the demux to a midi/intern/cc, set to midi cc 15. and then assign the mixer knob to midi cc nr 15.

Read full topic

item.title: Control mixer with pot meter
item.dc:creator: @kashis dennis
item.description:
@kashis wrote:

hello there,

Im trying to fix that i can control the mixer control with a pot meter .
is this possible? or in any another way?it is very important for my design.

the goal is to have a demuxer let me choose between in this case the amount of LFO.(in another case i want it to control level of OSC but it is same principle).If it is not possible with a mixer another object.
Or i was thinking to make the Pot-meter send via midi CC and have this specific midi CC assigned to the mixer button i want to control.
Any way is good for me but i have no clue how to do this im still a Noob.

greetings
